fieldValues.content: We've released Bolt 5.1.13 as a regular maintenance release. Since this release contains a few security-related fixes, we heartily recommend all Bolt users to upgrade their installations. See the Github Release page for details.
fieldValues.title: 🚀 Bolt 5.1.13 released

extras.title: 🚀 Bolt 5.1.13 released

extras.name: News

fieldValues.content: Happy July, everyone! We've just released Bolt 5.1.11, with a few minor tweaks and bugfixes. Check the Github release page for details, and (as always) run composer update to update!
fieldValues.title: 🚀 Bolt 5.1.11 released

extras.title: 🚀 Bolt 5.1.11 released

extras.name: News

fieldValues.content: Happy Friday, everyone! We've just released Bolt 5.1.10, with a bunch of fresh, new bugfixes. Check the Github release page for details, and (as always) run composer update to update!
fieldValues.title: ☀️ Bolt 5.1.10 released
